transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you in your emergency?
Hi, I need urgent help. I am experiencing stroke symptoms.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Ms. Ashley Murphy and I was born on December 01, 1966.
Thank you, Ms. Ashley Murphy. I've located your records. Let me assist you immediately.
Please stay calm. I am arranging an ambulance for your stroke symptoms. Is there someone with you?
Good. Ensure they keep you comfortable. The ambulance will arrive shortly. Please stay on the line for any updates.
